title: Look Back at Summer?
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>I’m a failure of a student council president....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>What’s wrong all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I mismanaged my summer allowance, so I had to get my next month’s allowance early.... Even though I’m supposed to be a role model for everyone....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufufu, you truly are dedicated, huh, Shioriko. Don’t worry, I do that too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeeh!? You do, Eli-san!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I think there are a lot of unavoidable expenses on summer vacation. It’s the only time where we all can have fun together, right? That’s why there’s no need to beat yourself up that much about it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Is that so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Was this summer fun for you, Shioriko?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes! Very much so!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Then forget about it and move on. Let’s make up for it by being a good role model for everyone on something else.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
